title: enna sheidAlum
sahitya:
enna sheidAlum endan tuNai nIyE en annaiyE umaiyE ennai nI


anupallavi

  cinna vayadu mudhl unnaiyE nambinEn
 shinandenai adittAlum parindeDut-taNaittAlum ini


caraNam    mun vinaiyAl inba tunbangaL viLaindiDa mUDamati koNDunnai nOvaden pEdamai
en vidhiyAl iDar Ayiram shUzhinum ellAm un tiruviLaiyADal enreNNi ini
